description: Eco-friendly, lightweight water bottle by EcoBottle. This bottle is made from 98% sugar cane bio mass waste. The screw cap is made from natural Portuguese cork. Designed and produced in Sweden using mainly carbon negative renewable energy. This product is environmentally and climate friendly as well as being very stylish due to its basic design. This is the perfect bottle for a striking and ecologically responsible promotion. Ideal for the office, in the gym or on the go.

reviews.review_text: I love my EcoBottle! It keeps my water cool all day, and I feel great knowing that I'm reducing plastic waste.
The EcoBottle is a great alternative to disposable bottles. It's durable and easy to clean. Highly recommended!

features: Made with Renewable Energy In Sweden
Wide mouth for easy filling and cleaning

specifications.material: HDPE Bioplastics, 98% sugar cane bio mass waste

description: The Organic Cotton Tote Bag is a versatile and sustainable accessory for everyday use. It is made from organic cotton, free from harmful chemicals, and features a spacious interior with sturdy handles.

reviews.review_text: I use this tote bag for grocery shopping, and it's perfect. It's sturdy and can hold a lot of items. Plus, it's eco-friendly!
The quality of this cotton tote bag is excellent. It feels durable, and the design is simple yet stylish.

product_name: Bamboo Toothbrush Set with Travel Case

reviews.review_text: I switched to these bamboo toothbrushes, and I'm impressed. They feel great, and I love the fact that they are environmentally friendly.
These toothbrushes are a sustainable alternative to plastic ones. They work well and are reasonably priced.

reviews.review_text: I love using this solar charger when I go hiking. It charges my phone well, and the fact that it's solar-powered is amazing.
This portable charger is a game-changer. It's compact, charges quickly, and being solar-powered makes it perfect for outdoor adventures.

features: Multiple USB ports for simultaneous charging

reviews.review_text: This bamboo cutlery set is fantastic. It's lightweight, durable, and perfect for on-the-go use. We use coconut oil to keep them looking as new after gentle hand washing.
I'm impressed with the quality of this bamboo cutlery set. It's a great addition to my eco-friendly lifestyle.

description: The Organic Cotton Yoga Mat is a natural and eco-friendly mat for yoga and exercise routines. It is made from organic cotton and provides a comfortable and non-slip surface for your practice.

reviews.review_text: This organic cotton yoga mat is excellent. It's soft, non-slip, and feels great during my yoga sessions. Plus, it's better for the environment.
I'm happy with this yoga mat. The quality is good, and it provides the right amount of cushioning for my workouts.

description: Reusable Beeswax Wraps are a sustainable alternative to plastic wraps for storing food. Made from organic cotton and coated with beeswax, they keep your food fresh while reducing plastic waste.

reviews.review_text: These beeswax wraps are great for keeping food fresh. They're easy to clean and reusable, which I love.
I switched to these reusable beeswax wraps, and they work perfectly. They're a sustainable choice for my kitchen.

reviews.review_text: I installed these solar-powered lights in my garden, and they look amazing. They're easy to set up and add a beautiful ambiance to the surroundings.
These outdoor lights are a great addition to my patio. They're bright, energy-efficient, and I love that they are solar-powered.
